textContent:
If the point of living is simply to experience existence. And if fulfilling experiences are created with moments of connection. Then connection is one way to a fulfilling and satisfying life. 

What takes me away from connection? Selfishness. Selfishness is turning my focus inward, on the circles I hold onto, defining who I think I am to those around me.  

But what if I am not who I think I am? What if I am the experience people have with me?  What is that experience? 

I believe the answer is love. Radiating selflessness is to radiate love. Love is patience. Love is kindness. Love is gentleness. Love does not boast. Love holds no grudges. Love listens. Love looks. Love connects. Love protects.

What connects me with others? Love.  Listening, kindness, gentleness, humility,  curiosity, forgiveness, eye contact, hugs, hand shakes, generosity, and helpfulness. 

If living a fulfilling life is to experience moments of connection, then be present with life itself - people. animals, plants, the earth, wind, smell, sight, sounds, is to be connected to the experience of living.  

I'm working on filling my heart with love and in doing so filling my life with connection in order for my life to be a satisfying and meaningful existence. 

Aaron
